logger.doc:name: Start Logger
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logger": "Start Logger Geocoding", "correlationId": vars.correlationId default "N/A", "transactionId": vars.transactionId default "N/A", "dateTime": now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'" }, "flow": flow.name default "unknown-flow", "layer": "process" }]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: { "housenumber": vars.payload.destino.endereco.numero, "street": vars.payload.destino.endereco.rua, "postcode": vars.payload.destino.endereco.codigoPostal, "city": vars.payload.destino.endereco.cidade, "state": vars.payload.destino.endereco.estado, "country": vars.payload.destino.endereco.pais, "format": "json" } filterObject (!isBlank($))

logger.doc:name: Error Logger
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logger": "Logger Error Request Geocoding", "errorDescription": error.description, "errorType": error.errorType, "httpStatus": error.attributes.statusCode default null, "correlationId": vars.correlationId default "N/A", "transactionId": vars.transactionId default "N/A", "dateTime": now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'" }, "flow": flow.name default "unknown-flow", "layer": "process" }]

logger.doc:name: End Logger
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logger": "End Logger Geocoding", "correlationId": vars.correlationId default "N/A", "transactionId": vars.transactionId default "N/A", "dateTime": now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'" }, "flow": flow.name default "unknown-flow", "layer": "process" }]
